posts.title: Go Away Doormat
posts.content: Send a clear message to unwanted visitors and solicitors by greeting them with this “go away” doormat. Made of natural coconut fibers, this 16 x 27 inch mat sports the blunt and succinct message warning visitors to stay away from your humble abode.

posts.title: Bacon Candy Canes
posts.content: BACON. It’s delicious, it smells like heaven, and it’s the perfect flavor for any kind of edibles – especially candy canes. These bacon candy canes are a fun twist on the classic Christmas candy and make a great snack during the holidays.

posts.title: Slow Feed Dog Bowl
posts.content: Add a little twist – or shall we say swirl – to your furry friend’s meals with the slow feed dog bowl. The bowl’s whimsical spiral pattern creates a fun challenge for your pet while helping to reduce bloating, obesity, and regurgitation by forcing the dog to eat slowly.

posts.title: Touch Screen Gloves
posts.content: Keep your hands warm and toasty while retaining your god given right to text people using your phone. These touch screen gloves have a special material used on the tips of the fingers and thumb areas, allowing your phone to respond to your finger input.

posts.title: Magnetic Molecular Modeling Kit
posts.content: Gain a better understanding of the elements that make up our world by constructing educational models of them using this magnetic molecular kit. The kit is easy to assemble and comes with the basic building blocks of life – carbon, oxygen and hydrogen atoms.

posts.title: Color Changing Umbrella
posts.content: Brighten up any gloomy and/or rainy day with the color changing umbrella. Apart from keeping you nice and dry during storms, the fun water droplet design emblazoned on the umbrella changes from white to rainbow colored when it gets wet.

posts.title: The Photo Ark
posts.content: Go on a globe-trotting safari without leaving your couch by looking through the pages of The Photo Ark. This visually captivating read depicts photographer Joe Sartore’s lifelong project to capture portraits of all the world’s animals – especially those that are endangered.

posts.title: History Of The Family Road Trip Book
posts.content: Relive the golden age of family road trips by making Don’t Make Me Pull Over! your next reading selection. This National Lampoon’s styled read takes a nostalgic and comical look the days when the entire family crammed into the station wagon for an adventure.

posts.title: Zombie Gnomes
posts.content: While we all eagerly await the zombie apocalypse and all the joys it will soon bring, we can bide our time for now by imagining our friendly lawn gnomes becoming infected. These zombie garden gnomes are hand painted and make an excellent Halloween decoration.

posts.title: Gold Flakes Nail Polish
posts.content: Make your most drab outfits stand out by adding a little flair with the gold flakes nail polish. Once you bedazzle your nails with some gold flakes you’ll give the impression your hands are adorned with the finest jewels and gems available on the planet.

posts.title: The Big Lebowski Guide Book
posts.content: Achieve inner happiness by following the teachings of The Dude using The Big Lebowski guide book. It features sections like “the seven spiritual laws of taking it easy” and “the science of really tying a room together” so that you can be more like The Dude.

posts.title: Periodic Table Shower Curtain
posts.content: Brush up on the fundamentals with the periodic table of elements shower curtain. This geeky and educational shower curtain displays the entire periodic table of elements in full color so you can study for the big test as you get ready in the morning.
